name: mac-windows
description: Provide information about Application Windows running and activate and Application.

scripts.build-activate-window: swift build -c release -Xswiftc -static-stdlib --package-path swift/ActivateWindow && cp swift/ActivateWindow/.build/release/ActivateWindow scripts/ActivateWindow
scripts.build-mac-windows: swift build -c release -Xswiftc -static-stdlib --package-path swift/MacWindows  && cp swift/MacWindows/.build/release/MacWindows scripts/MacWindows
scripts.build: npm run build-activate-window && npm run build-mac-windows

author: George Karagkiaouris
